name: Product Announcement
description: Create a product announcement for internal or external audiences
prompt_text:
Create a compelling product announcement for {feature_name}, formatted as a {announcement_type} targeting {target_audience}. The announcement should open with a strong hook that immediately communicates the value proposition and why this matters now. Frame the narrative around the customer problem being solved rather than the technical implementation.

Incorporate the following key benefits prominently:
{key_benefits}

Structure the announcement with a headline, a brief context-setting paragraph, a benefits-focused body, and a clear call to action appropriate for the audience. If this is an internal announcement, include enablement guidance so customer-facing teams know how to position and discuss this with customers. For external announcements, keep the language accessible and outcome-driven, avoiding internal jargon.

variables.name: feature_name
variables.label: Feature Name
variables.placeholder: e.g., Smart Inbox, AI Meeting Scheduler

variables.name: key_benefits
variables.label: Key Benefits
variables.placeholder: List the primary benefits and value this delivers
